name: Buoy Trouble
description:
Welcome to Buoy Trouble!

In this challenging, co-op rowing game you have to get to the beach before your dinghy deflates! Be careful not to bump into any rocks or else you might get a puncture and eventually sink.

CONTROLS

This game can be played by one player if they play as both player 1 and 2

Begin row strokeDo row strokePlayer 1AZPlayer 2KM Credits
